long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your tech talent search to the next level with Prohiring's Chrome extension, crafted for recruiters seeking exceptional IT professionals. Our extension streamlines your talent acquisition, letting you connect LinkedIn discoveries to Prohiring’s robust recruitment ecosystem.

➤ Key Features:

• Seamless LinkedIn Integration:
Save profiles with a single click, transferring LinkedIn data directly to your Prohiring database.

• Real-Time Vacancy Updates:
Monitor candidates' positions within your hiring process without missing a beat.

• Recruiting Made Easy:
Assign candidates to specific job openings and recruitment phases without navigating away from LinkedIn.

• Organized Candidate Data:
Keep candidate information neatly structured for efficient evaluation and decision-making.

• Direct Access:
A single click on our extension lets you access detailed candidate profiles on Prohiring.
